column5: Tough conditions is probably the main culprit in this weekender's lack of steelhead reprots. Maybe it was the sudden weather change that acted like a shock.  I was out on sunday bloody sunday, and put in a couple hrs of hopeless drifting.  Too low and Too clear.

hey...yeah, i didnt head out this weekend, same reasons as everyone else, i guess,    poor conditions,  i beleieve the weather is suppoesed to change this week and maybe by the thurs fri we will be back in business.....  lol,     PLEASE !!!!!       besides, it was a great weekend to watch football.....
Low clear water = poor steelhead fishing in the shallow L. Ontario tribs.  Bigger water like Niagara has been productive.  Tony
huron tribs have been ok, i just didnt post anything because i ddint land any fish on sunday or take pics...
managed a few tiny ones, but then 1 good 2 lber came along, buddy of mine caught it, and it went straight in the pan.
